    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

            <catalog>sdt.sulinet.hu</catalog>
            <entry>ab0282bf-12a2-11d8-9145-d64dc9453a34</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A zsidók története a babiloni fogságig</string>
            <string language="en-US">The History Of Jews Until The Babylonian Captivity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Geschichte Der Juden Bis Die Babylonian 
Gefangenschaft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Histoire des Juifs Jusqu'À la Captivité 
Babylonienne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O History Dos Jews Até O Captiveiro Babylonian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Storia Degli Ebrei Fino Alla Prigionia 
Babylonian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ιστορία των Εβραίων μέχρι την αιχμαλωσία 
Babylonian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Historia De Judíos Hasta El Cautiverio 
Babilónico</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A zsidó nép eredete, vándorlása, honfoglalása, államalapítása valamint a zsidó királyságok történetének rövid áttekintése a babiloni fogságig</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Jewish folk's origin, its wandering, foundation of a state and the short overview of the Jewish kingdoms' story the Babylonian captivity</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">történelem</string>
            <string language="en-US">history</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">Izrael</string>
            <string language="en-US">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">Salamon</string>
            <string language="en-US">Salamon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">monoteizmus</string>
            <string language="en-US">monotheism</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der jüdischen Ursprung des Volkes, sein 
wandering, Grundlage eines Zustandes und der kurze Überblick über 
die jüdischen Geschichte der Königreiche die Babylonian 
Gefangenschaft</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'origine des gens juifs, son errer, base d'un 
état et la vue d'ensemble courte de l'histoire des royaumes juifs la 
captivité babylonienne</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A origem do povo jewish, seu vaguear, fundação 
de um estado e a vista geral curta da história dos reinos jewish o 
captiveiro babylonian</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'origine della gente ebrea, il relativo 
vagabondaggio, fondamento di un dichiarare e la descrizione corta 
della storia dei regni ebrei la prigionia babylonian</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η προέλευση του εβραϊκού λαού, η περιπλάνησή του, 
ίδρυμα ενός κράτους και η σύντομη επισκόπηση της ιστορίας των 
εβραϊκών βασίλειων η αιχμαλωσία Babylonian</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El origen de la gente judía, el su vagar, 
fundación de un estado y la descripción corta de la historia de los 
reinos judíos el cautiverio babilónico</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Salamon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">monotheism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Salamon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
